content.rendered: Dr Posi Olatubosun is an experienced investment banker, stockbroker, auditor and tax practitioner. He is a Fellow member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (FCCA), Chartered Institute of Securities and Investment (FCSI) and the Advance Higher Education (FHEA). His PhD thesis in the area of accounting and financial management was awarded by the University of Sheffield, titled “Exploring ESG-Shareholder Activism in the UK”. The thesis investigated and analysed longitudinal investor engagement from a risk society perspective, thereby widening the understanding of corporate governance. His research interest includes shareholder activism, responsible investment, active institutional asset ownership, integrated reporting, extinction accounting and biodiversity reporting. His teaching interest covers taxation, accounting and corporate finance.
